meta_description.title: Silent Hill 2 - Wikipedia
meta_description.text: Silent Hill 2 is a 2001 survival horror game developed by Team Silent, a group in Konami Computer Entertainment Tokyo, and published by Konami.Director(s): Masashi TsuboyamaProducer(s): Akihiro ImamuraGenre(s): Survival horrorArtist(s): Masahiro Ito‎Gameplay · ‎Plot · ‎Themes and analysis · ‎Development

meta_description.title: Silent Hill 2
meta_description.text: Silent Hill 2 is the second installment in the Silent Hill survival horror series and the first game of the series to be released for Sony PlayStation 2.Main series: Silent Hill · 2 · 3 · 4 · Origins · Hom...Production: Konami · Team Silent · Climax Stu...Ports / Adaptations: Play Novel · Mobile · HD C...‎Silent Hill 2 Monsters · ‎Silent Hill 2 Original Soundtracks · ‎Franchise · ‎Puzzles

meta_description.title: Silent Hill 2 - Video Games - Amazon.com
meta_description.text: Silent Hill 2 offers 10 new formidable foes, plenty of puzzles, and bone-chilling gameplay. The sequel's new story and characters promise to thrill and terrify.Manufacturer: KonamiProduct Dimensions: 7.4 x 5.5 x 0.5 inches; 3.2 ...Rated: MatureItem Weight: 3.2 ounces Rating: 4.7 · ‎410 reviews · ‎$187.99 · ‎In stock

knowledge_panel.description: silent hill 2 is a 2001 survival horror game developed by team silent, a group in konami computer entertainment tokyo, and published by konami. the game was released from september to november, originally for the playstation 2. wikipedia
